    ProcessingFailed(String),
    InvalidAmount,
    CurrencyNotSupported,
}

    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter<'_>) -> fmt::Result {

            PaymentError::InvalidAmount => write!(f, "Invalid payment amount"
